tasks.title: Research and select a beginner guitar course or instructor
Purchase or borrow a guitar suitable for beginners
Learn the basic parts of the guitar
Practice tuning the guitar daily for 10 minutes
Learn 5 basic open chords (C, G, D, A, E) this week
Practice transitioning between the 5 open chords for 15 minutes each day
Watch online tutorials on strumming patterns and practice for 15 minutes
Learn and practice one simple song that uses the open chords
Document practice sessions in a practice journal
Set up a weekly review of progress and challenges
Join a local or online guitar community for support
Explore finger exercises to improve dexterity in the following weeks
